alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 5:47AM EST until January 11 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Gilboa Bridge. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flood stage. At 19.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by early this afternoon to a crest of 18.9 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Gilboa Bridge Flood Stage: 17.0 Observed Stage at Wed 5 am: 13.7 Forecast: Wed 7 am 14.7 Wed 1 pm 16.9 Wed 7 pm 18.9 Thu 1 am 18.8 Thu 7 am 17.4 Thu 1 pm 16.3 Thu 7 pm 15.6 Fri 1 am 14.9 Fri 7 am 14.3 &&
